start_at.description: Specifies the start of the phone number range for this porting phone number block.

end_at.description: Specifies the end of the phone number range for this porting phone number block.

activation_ranges.description: Specifies the activation ranges for this porting phone number block. The activation range must be within the block range and should not overlap with other activation ranges.

start_at.description: Specifies the start of the activation range. Must be greater or equal the start of the extension range.

end_at.description: Specifies the end of the activation range. It must be no more than the end of the extension range.
